value.title: The Sims 4 could use AI to automatically turn photographs into characters
value.excerpt: A patent filed by EA back in April 2020 (and subsequently approved in October 2021) reveals AI technology that could be used in The Sims 4 game to turn pictures of people into in-game characters with just two clicks.

value.title: Levi’s AI Chief Says Algorithms Have Helped Boost Revenue
value.excerpt: The use of AI has helped the apparel company make better decisions in areas such as pricing and shipping, Chief Strategy and AI Officer Katia Walsh says.

value.title: How AI And ML Are Changing Finance In 2022
value.excerpt: Naturally, AI (artificial intelligence) and ML (machine learning) are at the heart of this, and it comes as no surprise that the industry is predicted to be worth over $17,440 million with a CAGR of 17.

value.title: Intel steers toward driverless future with Mobileye self-driving car unit
value.excerpt: Intel Corp's Mobileye is piloting a robotaxi service in Paris presently, and plans to take its self-driving car unit public in the US in mid-2022

value.title: FinTech Firm Avant Debuts Avant Banking
value.excerpt: FinTech Avant is launching Avant Banking, a mobile banking solution with a transparent fee structure, early payday funds for direct deposit customers and more.

value.title: ‘Mother/Android’ Review: What to Expect When You’re Expecting During a Robot Uprising
value.excerpt: A young couple with a baby on the way tries to flee to safety after androids have gone rogue and decided to wipe out the human race.

value.title: US Energy Department tests new smart grid chip from Nvidia, Utilidata
value.excerpt: The Department of Energy is aiming to use the chip to scale and commercialize its power flow optimization technology, allowing for more resources like electric vehicles and solar panels to connect to smart grid operations.

value.title: Characters for good, created by artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: MIT Media Lab researchers offer positive use cases of AI-generated synthetic characters for education and well-being. A new paper provides an open-source, easy-to-use pipeline that combines AI-generated models to create synthetic characters with facial gestures,

value.title: Gtmhub raises $120M to expand its automatic OKR-tracking platform
value.excerpt: Gtmhub, a company developing OKR-tracking software, has raised $120 million in capital, bringing its total raised to over $161 million.

value.title: How to Leverage AI for Maximum Benefits for Your Business
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is dramatically changing the business world and AI writer assistants in specific can help you to create content on a scale for your business and attract potential new customers.

value.title: Meta releases Bean Machine to help measure AI model uncertainty
value.excerpt: Meta (formerly Facebook) has released Bean Machine, a tool designed to help measure uncertainty in AI and machine learning models.

value.title: Waymo says self-driving car that struck pedestrian in San Francisco was in manual mode
value.excerpt: A Waymo self-driving Jaguar I-Pace that struck a pedestrian in San Francisco on Wednesday evening was in manual mode, the company told TechCrunch in response to an initial report posted on Reddit. Waymo says the vehicle was in manual mode at the time,

value.title: Most Indian firms able to pay back on artificial intelligence investments in 2 years: Survey
value.excerpt: The study laid an additional focus on measures taken by AI leaders and global capability centres (GCCs) or to embrace AI for their business growth.

value.title: Flexxon SSDs, Laptops Have AI-Based Data Security Inside
value.excerpt: The X-PHY AI Embedded Cyber Secure SSD is an internal SSD designed to detect any threats, known or unknown, to your data's security. The company also teamed with Lenovo on three lines of ThinkPad-based laptops.

value.title: Artificial intelligence accurately predicts who will develop dementia in two years
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence can predict which people who attend memory clinics will develop dementia within two years with 92 percent accuracy, a largescale new study has concluded.

value.title: Continual raises $4M for its AI-powered data platform
value.excerpt: Continual, a startup that aims to bring operational AI to the modern data warehouse-centric data stack, today announced that it has raised a $4 million seed round led by Amplify Partners, with Illuminate Ventures,

value.title: Unbabel acquires Lingo24 to bolster AI-driven translations for enterprises
value.excerpt: Unbabel, a startup delivering AI-driven translations, today announced the decision to acquire Lingo24, a UK-based language service provider.

value.title: Amira Learning CEO Personalizes Artificial Intelligence For Literacy Gains
value.excerpt: Amira Learning CEO, Mark Angel, talks AI within the literacy world and the strides being made to support our youngest learners.

value.title: DataRobot’s DataRobot Core aims to accelerate AI system deployment
value.excerpt: DataRobot 's new DataRobot Core platform is designed to deliver improved AI design tools to enterprises in a range of industries.

value.title: OctoML helps enterprise automate with ML platform for the edge
value.excerpt: OctoML’s machine learning platform is an edge AI optimization solution, a category of solutions designed to optimize the performance of AI solutions at the network’s edge with automated deployment, so that engineers don’t have to spend hours on administration and manual optimization.

value.title: CXOs: Are we ready for AI to assist human decision-making?
value.excerpt: One of the emerging areas of AI use in corporations is to assist in human decisions. But is it ready, and are the decision-makers ready for it?

value.title: Motional and Uber partner to launch autonomous delivery pilot in Santa Monica in 2022
value.excerpt: Motional, a driverless technology company, is partnering with Uber to launch an autonomous delivery pilot in Santa Monica, according to Motional. Uber Eats customers will be able to order restaurant meal kits to be delivered to them via one of Motional’s retrofitted all-electric Hyundai

value.title: France latest to slap Clearview AI with order to delete data
value.excerpt: Controversial facial recognition company, Clearview AI, which has amassed a database of some 10 billion images by scraping selfies off the Internet so it can sell an identity-matching service to law enforcement,

value.title: China's mobile robots attract big money
value.excerpt: ForwardX Robotics, which makes autonomous mobile robots for materials handling, recently announced the completion of its Series C. The funding is part of a broader narrative playing out in China, where the domestic robotics sector has soared thanks to an onshoring push by the government and heavy investment in the country's tech sector.

value.title: TuSimple locks in self-driving trucks deal with DHL
value.excerpt: Self-driving trucks developer TuSimple has reached a deal to integrate its autonomous vehicle technology into DHL Supply Chain’s operations. As part of the deal, the contract logistics giant has reserved 100 autonomous trucks that are being co-developed by TuSimple and Navistar.
